thread.title: IBM in bid to stop Qld damages claim
thread.title_full: IBM in bid to stop Qld damages claim

title: IBM in bid to stop Qld damages claim
text:
Tue, Aug 25, 2015, 12:09 PM AEST - Australia Markets close in 3 hrs 51 mins IBM in bid to stop Qld damages claim AAP – 15 minutes ago Print 
Technology giant IBM can't be sued over Queensland's health payroll disaster under a 2010 settlement with the state, the company's lawyers say. 
Lawyers for IBM Australia have fronted the Brisbane Supreme Court in a bid to block the Queensland government from suing it over the public administration bungle. 
Barrister Shane Doyle QC, for IBM, said a September 2010 settlement agreement between the company and the state included a covenant not to sue. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Treasurer promises tax cuts and surplus AAP
